# READ DATA

Read the CSV data from `gi_food_data.csv`. Ensure the data file is in the same directory as this markdown R.

```{r}
GI.data <- read.csv("gi_data.csv")
```

Check the table's column names

```{r}
colnames(GI.data)
```
